analysis.description: TRXToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/26/0x45d4764288362cb85c55440e9f2d5729f2581411.sol#313-319) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x45d4764288362cb85c55440e9f2d5729f2581411.sol:
	Contract TRXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x45d4764288362cb85c55440e9f2d5729f2581411.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TRXToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/26/0x45d4764288362cb85c55440e9f2d5729f2581411.sol#289-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/26/0x45d4764288362cb85c55440e9f2d5729f2581411.sol#292)

TRXToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/26/0x45d4764288362cb85c55440e9f2d5729f2581411.sol#313-319)
	- /unique_chucks/26/0x45d4764288362cb85c55440e9f2d5729f2581411.sol#318-319
